lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, here, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors play Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it! Damn it! It was perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ashley Johnson. Pike is amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, that's cool. This is our 40th episode. 40th episode. That's crazy to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which we could have waited and celebrated 50th episode, but fuck it. 40 it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we'll celebrate 50th like a motha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We told ourselves 40 and done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So this is the last episode, you guys. Hope you've had fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully not. I certainly hope not. We'll see how tonight goes. So yeah, that'll be cool and we're gonna have our anniversary coming up in March too, which will be fun, so excited for that. Yeah, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, will our 50th time up with our year? We got to figure this math out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four episodes in February.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Close, we'll see. That would be crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. No, it won't, but close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I don't think so, but anyway, couple of quick announcements, just a reminder we're going to be at Wizard World Portland, February 20th-21st, so if you guys are in the area and want to come say hello, we'll be there for those two days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come out and say hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, do it. We'll be doing signings. We'll have panels Saturday and Sunday, so it should be a fun time and hopefully we'll see you there. Me and Marisha will be in Denver for Colorado Anime Fest the weekend before that, for Valentine's day weekend in Denver, Colorado. So if you guys are in that area, you can come and visit us, also for fun panels and insanity that shall ensue. So look forward to that. Also, me and Marisha will be in Ireland, we can now announce, at the beginning of March. For Kaizoku Con. In Ireland so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's as Irish as it can gets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we've never been. We're excited to come out and see that side of the UK and that part of Europe real fast. It's going to be really cool. So we look forward to seeing you guys out there hopefully.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got one, too. I've got one too. I'm going to be, the weekend before that as well, the Valentine's Day weekend, at Amazing Arizona Comic Con. Amazing Arizona Comic Con. It's going to be amazing. In Arizona. With comics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to be raising Arizona?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. You're fired. You're razing Arizona with fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get those out of the way now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else have any other events coming up they want to mention, if anything, anyone? No? If one pops up, you're welcome to jump in. Let's see, we also have a few projects that recently came out. Liam, since you are partly at helm of both of these projects.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I voice directed on two games. They're the exact same game, basically. One is called 'The Witness.' Mastermind Jonathan Blow has created a very, very unique game. There's no shooting people in the face or any of that, but it looks to be one of the best gaming experiences of the year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's getting amazing reviews.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I also directed the voices for-- And Ashley Johnson is in The Witness. And I also got to direct most of the voiceover for, what's it called? Lego Marvel Avengers, which everybody--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what's the name of that? Oh yeah, Lego Marvel Avengers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've heard of it. Show of hands, who's doing a voice in the game? Aww. Well, next one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Marvel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She was the first and last person I thought of.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait! Who did they cast as Ms. Marvel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashly Burch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marvel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't that hardcore?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also unique fun fact: Ashley is playing the character she played in the Avengers movie, so her Lego figure looks like her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? That's amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, a reminder for Wyrmwood Gaming, who makes awesome wooden game stuff. They're still supporting our special code to get free shipping when you order from them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That code is 'critrole'. Critrole. You get free shipping if you type in 'critrole', but you got to do it on their website, not other websites.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, doesn't work well if you go to like Bed, Bath and Beyond. We don't have a relationship with them. Yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should register at very least, at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're working on it. We're working on it. We think there is a lot of great crossover, like the Venn diagram between Bed, Bath and Beyond enthuasiasts and Critters. So, do we have any other announcements anyone wants to make or shall we dive on in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't plugged them in a while. Our wonderful charity that we support: 826LA. Go check them out. There's still a huge portion of our proceeds that go to 826LA every week and-- Well, they tutor children through the ages of kindergarten and 18, because kindergarten is an age, and help in creative writing and storytelling, and they also have cool store fronts all the way across the country. There's one in like San Fran. I know there's one in New York.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a pirate store. There's a superhero store.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's one in Seattle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus you are handing out D&D to young kids, getting them started and hooked at a young age.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Yeah, if you have an 826 in your area, you should go there and tutor, and you should be like 'Hey.'

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should go to there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should go to there and you should tutor to there and you should introduce D&D to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Run a D&D game for kids.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run a D&D game for kids. It's very fulfilling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I want to give a shoutout.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Ashley, go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, and when Laura and Travis came to visit-- It's basically a gaming shop and you can play D&D there on Wednesday nights and Saturdays. And play board games. It's also a coffee shop. It's rad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brooklyn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They got like cookies and a little coffee thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bought a Millennium Falcon cookie when I was there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was pretty dope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was delicious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it called again, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The Brooklyn Strategist. Check it out if you're in New York or Brooklyn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What else can we do to put off dying by four ancient dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else can we talk about for the next four hours?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at all that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you all come rushing through the other side of the transport spell, each one of you comes stumbling out into the center of the temple to Sarenrae that's constructed on the base floor of your keep. The sheer intensity and force that pushes you all through one after another, some of you end up tripping and catching yourself, but nevertheless you all make it through safe and sound before the large tree trunk behind you, the portal, snaps shut, the magic exhausted. The adrenaline still pumping in your head, you're all still thinking over and processing what exactly had just happened and what it means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we all here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All those people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes? Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anyone hurt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we see anything from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around right now, you have the stained glass of the complex. The keep seems to be in order. From this perspective, you don't see anything because the city is on the opposite side of the keep. This portion of the temple is actually facing southward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose I'd like to get a vantage point, to see what we can see. Is there any way to-- I think we all took damage. I think we're all hurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all hurt a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, heal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, let me do some healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, be aware, as part--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know where I'm at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast, let's see, you cast Heal once, which I believe was your 6th-level spell, and then you cast Mass Cure Wounds, so a 5th-level spell. So you've cast a 6th and a 5th.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: One 6th and one 5th?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. All right, and then healthwise, where am I at? Went down 66?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Healthwise, you were down 66 and then you healed up, I don't remember the exact number. It was like 24. We'll go with 24. It's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay guys, let's do a Mass Cure Wounds then at fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Which one is this? Are you casting Cure Wounds?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On who?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A Mass Cure Wounds, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mass Cure Wounds is a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How low is everybody?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 43, but if we can take a short rest, we can roll some dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm at 32, so same thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Short rest?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Short rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should get inside, anyways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get inside. I want to see if I can get a vantage from the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think in the short term, we need to take care of two things: one, get a vantage point and see how the keep is and what we can see from above. We also need to get the staff out of here, we need to send them away immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we send them away or do we send them down below? Like for shelter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't need them running out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's safer than running around outside, that's where I want to end up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Send them below.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Out of the city, though, into the wild?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we need to, we can bring them through the portal into Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know what all is safe right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm all right, so I'm going to go find the staff and herd them down below and tell them what has happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we all head down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, let's head down to my workshop because I have to unlock it anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, are you not casting Cure Mass Wounds? You have one more 5th-level spell, so you could do if you wanted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, let me go ahead and do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So I believe that's 3d8 plus five, unless I'm mistaken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one's on everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was on, this would be on up to six creatures, so 3d8+5. Well, everybody but one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody but Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, everybody but Scanlan, we'll put it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so everyone heals 18 hit points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Rolled a little low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. Okay, you're heading off--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start moving through the entire place, I'm going to start at the front gate and see if anybody's outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head into the foyer, the first thing you see is Laina currently panicking about, running around with Erwin falling behind, trying to calm her down and going, "Laina, it's all right "calm down." And Laina is like, "I don't know what to do, I, I--" She turns around and sees you, "Oh, "Master, Master Vax."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's actually not all right, we need to gather everyone right now, quickly, I'll explain after we've gotten everyone in the keep. We need to go to Percival's workshop, can you help me with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can do that, we have a problem--" She points out. The front of the keep is currently opened, the doors and the gate's there and you can hear what sounds like a cluster of very loud voices, shouting and screaming and yelling over each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outside of the keep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I'm on my own, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are the voices speaking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you following him to the foyer? Currently only Vax is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go to Percival's workshop, go, I will handle it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I figured we'd all be moving outside, at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys move into the foyer to follow, you see Vax having this conversation with Laina. She and Erwin go head back down, to head down to the workshop. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go stealth toward the door to see what the hell is going on out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, good to know. All right, so as you go to the door and look out, you can see, along the top wall there are three figures. Takes you a moment to focus, and you realize that it is Kendrick, who's one of your general guards you keep around, as well as Cordell and Shayne. All three of them have crossbows ready, and they're yelling to each other and aiming them over the wall towards the front. However, what you can hear from this point is a chorus of 20, 30 or more voices muffled from the other side of the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to join them on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so there is a ladder at the side, and you climb up the ladder, and as you get closer, you hear people shouting, different voices going, "Let us in, let us in or we'll die!" Voices going, "What are you doing, you going to leave us out here?!" Other people are screaming, you hear crying children, you hear people shrieking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many people am I seeing down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as you get up to the top and crest over, you can see the three guards are all yelling at each other and yelling over, "We can't, we can't do anything right now, we're waiting for "th--" They look over and see you come over the edge, and you can see there's probably close to 50 or so people that are all pressed up against the gates to the inside of your keep, that are all shouting to be let in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I look past, do I see anyone else coming towards the keep? Is it just a cluster and that's it, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of them are heading out into the distance, getting far away as possible. A few more are heading towards the keep, and you gather that this crowd has been gathering here for the last few minutes, at the very least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, slapping my hand on Kendrick's shoulder. We are going to let these people in. The city has come under attack, everything is fucked beyond belief. There are at least four large, old dragons attacking the city, and these people need to come inside. I don't know what we're going to do with them, but we're going to bring them in now. And you and I are going to wait by the gate for those stragglers to come in. The rest of you, take them inside, join the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other. Cordell gives you a nod, "Right, sir, we'll open the gate, hold "on." And you guys all, are you heading out to the courtyard as well? Or are you staying inside the keep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, we see them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you come out and see this happening and hear them shouting at the top of the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth stands in the middle of the foyer, unable to move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep them out of my workshop, but put them into the spare rooms and anywhere we have room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the cathedral?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cathedral is a great idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you hear this strange high-pitched whine sound. Vax, as you look up, you can see there are these columns of smoke that are billowing out of the city in the distance as mass areas are burning and smoldering. You see coming out of one of the clouds something spinning slowly towards you, and you look up and see it's one of the skyships from the Cloudtop District, one half of it currently in flames.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inside, now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scream out, get the gates open now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you can see now Shayne and Cordell are pulling on the ratchets, pulling the chains up as fast as they can while putting their eyes up and seeing this as it careens in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running up to the tower as quickly as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm fireman's pole down the ladder, down one side of the ladder to get to the gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The gate opens a little bit, enough to get one or two people through, and begins to push through, and you can see now people are yelling in pain as they're being crushed, as the whole mass of them are pushing through the small opening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scream out: if you rush, you will die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't seem to be affecting anybody, unfortunately. There's this inlaid fear, this animalistic need to survive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start to grab people arms and pulling them through and helping people get through safely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the skyship has passed overhead, missing the top of the keep and the highest walls by about 40 or so feet. For a few seconds of silence, and you hear impact, shaking the ground for a few seconds. Not far from here, you can see another blast of red fire and a couple of sparks of arcane energy that arc out, as another column of smoke south of you begins to pour up into the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feeling that, I snap out of it and run to the south exit of the castle to look for the explosion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you start rushing in that direction, to the south side of the castle, looking back to where the skyship came through, you can see the smoke parts once more, and you see unfurling from within two large white wings bearing down, and you can see as it swoops down, there are groups of people that are rushing 100, 200, 300 feet away, that are pulling themselves out of the ravine that sits between the south walls of Emon and the north walls of your keep. As they're pouring through the mud and the stream there, it's about four or five feet deep, it swoops down and unleashes a blast of freezing cold energy that freezes that whole section of the river solid and every person in that vicinity as well. Locked in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does Keyleth see all of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see this because you're inside the wall. You see it come down and swoop by. You see it circle around. You, however, have a good view of this, right as you're about to go down the wall on the ladder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, I need you on the roof.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I run up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go running up, you guys see now it circles back around and its wings tilt to one side as it begins to make its way towards the keep for a second sweep. I would like everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got to get down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to go first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put you there. Percy and Vex, you guys are up on the wall, technically, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Up here, so we can get down real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so the ladder is there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, shouldn't there be a door that leads to that anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The way this is designed is it's a ladder getting up and down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you still go down the ladder, or are you staying up top here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I already said I went down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is currently inside for the sake of this, and may come out here in a moment, he's figuring out what's going on. Grog, where are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess I was out in the courtyard, trying to help the cattle come in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so let's go ahead and place some cattle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The door to get back inside is located where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, where's the cathedral at? Is that what the other entry is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People are pouring through at this point, trying to get through as fast as possible. Whole cluster of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to get that thing finished.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's more on the outside there? Is that what you're putting there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you are where?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Somewhere around there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the center, keeping watch there, all right, and Trinket is with you-- or Trinket can't make it up the ladder, so Trinket is staying in the courtyard, probably keeping close to Pike right there. All righty, so. Initiative. 25 to 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get, Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who got 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Pike, what did you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Matt, real quick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said 'yeah', you can go ahead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I think I do have a sixth level because I think that sixth level was used for Liam with the worm, and then we came back to the keep to rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, that's correct, you do have a sixth level spell, still. Yes, thank you for the reminder. Good on you. All right, and so here we have Cordell, we have Shayne, and we have Kendrick right there on the top, as well. Top, currently the dragon is about, I'd say, 120 feet off this direction. You're up first, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it seem like the dragon has noticed us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon at the moment is currently seeing the keep. It doesn't notice anyone in particular, it just sees a swarm of people trying to get inside, and it's circling around to try and do another dive attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How dumb am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you, buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be real dumb because I'm standing next to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to pull out Bad News, and I'm going to make a targeted shot at its wings and try to put a hole into its wings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it, go ahead and take the shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, golden snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get the hell out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm back, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll some damage on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little, tiny ray of sunshine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d12 for the hit on that, and then what's the save, to see if it can maintain height?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right-- (laughs) It rolled a four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is plus 14 to its constitution saving throw, so it's 18. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN

(grunts) Pushing a giant frozen bear and he's sliding against the grass in the front of the courtyard. Sweat's beginning to pop on your brow as your teeth are gritted, and looking over your shoulder, you can still hear the snapping and the-- The air itself of the entire courtyard has dropped about 20 degrees, and you can begin to see your breath in the vicinity of this creature. He is going to use-- What did he tell me, how many slots he wanted to do? Okay, so he's going to use three of its charges to do this one, that will put it at--

As it blasts out from the opposite side of it through the bottom of the cloud, keeping everyone else outside of the collateral damage radius of the Fireball because of its height, so that's good. Scanlan then, realizing the circumstances, uses the rest of his movement to get back into the very corner of the Keep and defend himself against the wall. That's going to end Scanlan's turn. As the red dragon returns towards the city, its voice is ringing out at a volume that, even at this distance, is being enhanced by some sort of arcane means, whether it means-- it wants to be heard. And as you can see now, as it hits over the far south walls of Emon, it shouts out once more, "Hear me, insects! You that live do so "out of mercy. Fight or flee and you forfeit that mercy. This has been a very impactful moment for the survivors you've taken under your wing.
