lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, come, please come in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unlocked, Vex walks in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what's this big master plan you're all plotting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex. Vax, do you want to-- Well, actually, we might as well get Keyleth down here as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike, Keyleth, meet me in my-- I'm going to walk and attempt to gently scoop the skull up and put it behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To catch things up, I walk out the door and I'm going to get the other two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I notice that, I have a really good passive perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, you see him scoot go over to the table and move something behind his back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who did? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You head up to the main foyer area where the stairs come up through the armory and lead into to the main hallway that bisects the center of the main floor, just as Keyleth and Pike are coming out of the temple after being summoned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I beeline right up to them and I drop down in front of Pike. Pike. Keyleth. We're working on a plan, and we don't have one yet, but Pike-- and I'm down on my knee-- you need to guide Grog. He doesn't listen to anyone else, he only listens to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is something wrong?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes and no. It's better if you just come. Pike, come.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I take Keyleth's hand and pull her after me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's in the room right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now it's just you, Percy, and Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I shut the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog walks over and closes the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want that skull. I want it now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is about the skull, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Percy's trying to do some fucked-up shit with the skull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did you close the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys aren't there yet. This hasn't happened yet, you guys are still walking down the stairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can't lock it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but I can stand in front of it. I want the skull, right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me see your sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you don't want to see the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I point at the table and I say: reach into the shadow and see if you can take the skull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think so, your water fucked me up last time. You get it out of the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check them to see who is fucking with who--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- and who has better intentions right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double insight check? Okay, the gold one is for Percy, and the thorny one is for Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Naturally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Good for both of them, motherfucker! The gold one is a 27 for Percy and-- 15 plus eight, what is 15 plus eight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 plus eight is naturally 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23 for Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I rolled it for both of them. Was one of those a natural 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but one of them is 27 and 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, 27 and 23, okay, good. Looking at them both, they're still very guarded and you are unable to really--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the best poker faces you've seen on either of them in a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we at the door yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are now getting to the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, big man, Trickfoot wants to talk to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look Grog right in the eye before they come in. I very quietly say: does your friend have an opinion on the skull?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which friend?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your new friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck? What the fuck is going on?! What fucking friend and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw you, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put my ear to the door. Can I hear them a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can hear shouting from the other side, but it's too thick.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try opening it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's unlocked, and you open the door and it stops as if there's a door stop directly behind it. You feel the door slamming you in the back, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or pick who you trust. I trust your judgment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trust? Vex, listen to me. What did you see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's your friend?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) The skull grants a wish. It can only be used by those with dark presence around them. That's Percy, that's me. How has Percy done with dark shit in the past? I went to him for help because I'm trying to free the city of these fucking dragons, but it wanted Percy. I tried to keep it for myself. And now he's up to his shady shit all over again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It specifically wants Percy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It wanted Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I said 'no.'

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The hell you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) Wait, who wanted who?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we wiggle in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to, but Grog, you hold the door shut? The door's not moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't understand what's going on yet, but both Grog and Percival are a little fucked up, but Grog is more fucked up, but I don't understand everything. But things are not good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hearing Vax unload that information, if I reach through the crack in the door, can I touch Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just enough of a gap where you could probably get an arm through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like my tiny little female hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I push the door open? Or at least try?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Try to. Pike, make a strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, go first, go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach through, and if I can grab Grog, I cast Hold Person on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool, I'll stay right where I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well-- Then we can push him over, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try, yeah. All right, so. Hold Person: does it require--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I weigh like 600 pounds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's three of us, we can push real hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can get Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, looking at Hold Person here, hold on just a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait! Wait, can I redact that? Can I redact that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you already said it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has to be a humanoid you can see within range. So you couldn't even Hold Person through the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beautiful-- Even better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You read the spell, didn't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, Scanlan, join us. Please, quickly, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan goes, "I'm trying to help some folks, but if you insist, all right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do, I do insist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex. If he has the skull, we've got to get it from him now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have the skull. I'm not going to use it, I don't trust him not to use it, yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you guys give me the skull, I'm not even touched by anything dark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Give her the skull.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I pull it out from behind me and hand it to you. It's in the bag, wrapped in cloth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. I'm going to get fucking attacked by Grog. I'm going to back up into a corner and hold on to it and look down at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm holding onto it? Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are holding onto it, and it's wrapped in the tapestry that you guys threw over it originally, but you can feel it in your hands, and it's not terribly heavy, it has some heft to it, and just having it there, you're already getting pins and needles on the back of your neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, Shorthalt, now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he trying to bamf in? Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. So, Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to try and push in the door open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a strength check. Grog, make a strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With all my strength.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she pushes, can I get up against the crack to see if I can see through while she pushes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door lurches, but you hold it solidly in place. You can feel--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog! Let me in!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a fuck-- just a minute!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've been waiting five minutes! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put your pants on, Grog, really.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just another minute, mom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think this is probably the stupidest thing, why did I decide to hold it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me the skull, you don't want Percy to have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want either of you to have it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't give me the skull, but don't give him the skull either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want to, you can ask it what it wants, and then you'll know, or you can give it to me and we can be done with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we trying to hand Grog the evil things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take the tapestry off it and I ask it, what the fuck do you want? What the fuck are you? What the fuck is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see in the midst of its coloration these energy-based eyes and grin, a toothy grin that goes, "I wish to be freed. That is all. I've "been here far too long. I grow tired. I want to finally pass."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a chuckle. "No. Vecna has been long gone. I am not a being of such power."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check the fucking thing in the eyeball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make a insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, no problem. Unless it was a natural 20, it doesn't matter, 15, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, you don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Way higher than 15, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 21, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22, I can add.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, okay, that's way higher. You take a look at it, but due to the fact that it's mostly hidden, there aren't facial tics and there aren't normal gives to what a person's intent is, and even the tone of voice itself is spectral, ominous and otherworldly. You have a hard time being able to read whether or not it's being honest or lying or anything in between.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan here yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would we free it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is now behind the door on the other side, and he enters the room with you guys and is like, "What's going on, everything cool?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, the door is open now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's with you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah good, yeah, Bigby that shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bum rush Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, Dimension Door me in, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we need a name for the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bum rush Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm using quick draw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Initiative rolls from both of you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this mean the door flies open?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, the door flies open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is all seconds, this is happening in seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I roll anything? Can I do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh, Jesus. 28?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say roll with disadvantage, because it catches you entirely off-guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So this is a surprise attack. Ugh, that's lame. That was just 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you had a--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, okay. All right, so, you see Grog lower his head and then go for a burst run across the length of the workshop towards Vex. You instinctually go quick draw, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm shooting a warning shot past his head, diving in, taking the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you close enough? I backed into a corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got six spaces of movement in my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not a big room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Diving and grabbing the head and curling back around--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The head? The skull?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grabbing the skull and going--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's 50/50 distance between us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm moving first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm happy to spend an action surge if that'll make this work better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think you can just grab it from me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: D&D standoff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can make a roll for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you dart, Percy is waiting for someone to also dart, and both of you go rushing across the room. Percy manages to get there a fraction of a second before you do. You hear the blast of his pistol past your ear, and the ringing hits the center of your head, but you still continue pushing forward in the way that Grog does, ignoring all outside interference. However, you've gotten to the skull first. Are you going to attempt to wrestle it from her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gently pull it out of his run. So I'm going pull it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to try to pull me out of the way or just the fucking skull, you dick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's pretty grappled to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, if she's that grappled to it, then I'm going to try and push her out of the way of Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, opposed strength checks from both of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't seem to care much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He really, really doesn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, that's terrible-- nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's less of a shove and more of a pull out of the way of Grog's rush.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so, he reaches over and grabs the skull in your arm and pulls you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I grab her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Wait, you rolled a 13?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's holding the skull there and they're both looking at you expectantly. What are you doing to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want Percy. I'm going to tackle Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am going to run straight towards Percy and tackle him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tackle him, okay, all right. So, let's get some proper rumble music for this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are dragons outside and we're fighting, playing rugby with a fucking skull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying to fix the dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use the momentum of the rush and you see him do this, you turn out of the way and go for a shoulder shove. I want you to go ahead and make an attack roll. Actually, make an athletics roll versus your acrobatics.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why can't that be higher? 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah shit, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, I need you to go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit. 17, oh, saving throw. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You slam into him and you essentially shove him with the shoulder. You manage to knock him prone, but the skull doesn't come loose, he loses his grip on it, and currently Vex is still holding it front of you. You're prone on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm prone on the ground?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Vex still has it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's Vex's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I knocked him off of her. But you've still got the skull.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't trying to wrestle it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you want to try and accomplish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I would like to turn and put my back to Vex, because she has the skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're expecting, he turns towards you, instead he steps and his giant frame is now blocking you with the shoulder blades in front, his arms out in a defensive position, facing off with people as they begin to enter the room. What are you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I reach up and I touch his back. And I say: are you yourself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you, fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yes, fuck, it's me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I back up into a corner, and I say: what is all this about? Why do you even need this? Why do we want to set it free? I don't understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't, we don't, we just don't want him to have Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rest of us see this now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point now, the door's burst open, and the rest of you guys rush in and you can see Percy just as he hits the ground. You can see Grog recovering from the shoulder slam, who then steps in front of Vex with this snarl on his face and begins shouting to her over his shoulder, and you hear them talking across the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't want me, I don't want to use the skull. I want to keep you from using it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is going on in here?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth cracks her staff on the floor and does a Gust cantrip and goes (whoosh) to make a big burst of wind in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Tools go falling off the wall and clattering to the stone floor of the establishment. All of you who have hair have it blown and wrapped around you. You are pushed back about three inches from the burst of it, and all of you, immediately, your attention goes to Keyleth who stands there with her staff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it dusty in there now? Or is it just windy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not dusty, it's covered in layers of soot that have now been kicked up, and the air itself is a temporary fume.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have an order?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Silence!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does that. Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight-check Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you trying to know?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to know why he wants this skull so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. If you would like to relay any information, she peered pretty well into your demeanor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to get rid of the dragons, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "I'm right here, Matt."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Burn, burn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop, drop, and roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm saying that's the best way she can discern your demeanor right now. Pike, anything else you want to do right now? We have to continue this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep. Can I walk over and grab Craven Edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Craven Edge is currently sheathed on his back, away from you. So you can attempt to, if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, can you give me Craven Edge, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, hands out to you and looking you earnestly in the face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just want to look at it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, you sure about this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just want to see, something's not quite right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get up at this point or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are about to get back to the top of the round. So you do what you're doing, okay. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stand up and grab a poker off the table. I'm leaving my gun on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not off the table, the wind gust knocked off a lot of these things on the ground. Small pile of tools next to you. So you grab the poker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab a poker and I take a corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So now, Percy, you've squared off into a corner, there's Vex in the other corner, Grog's standing in between the two with the back against Vex. The three of you are right there at the front. Pike has stepped up to Grog now and is beseeching him. That's Percy. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at Pike. I turn around, I look at Vex. You'll thank me. And I'd like to try and pull the skull out of her hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a strength check against her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez, oh come on. There's no way, even if I roll like a-- Unless I get a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like tearing a toy from a child's grasp, it is removed from you with barely any sort of resistance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a spell off on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. So Grog, that's your action. You grab and you have now the skull. You left her with the tapestry, like you have just the bare skull in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would I like to do with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a bonus action, so depends on what you're trying to accomplish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I spike it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah, I'd say yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say this would be your movement and bonus, I'll let you do that, the whole thing together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to spike the skull.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're just going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are the fucking chances?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach up, at the apex of your throw you look down and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't believe it. I don't fucking believe it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your eyes catch Pike, and during that brief moment of slow-motion as you reach up, you see her face, this look of complete, heartbreaking disappointment. Just like that. It shakes you in a way that you didn't expect, and as you go through the motion you already anticipated, and your brain's already wandered in doing so. You slam it half-heartedly and it bounces and skids across the ground, over by where Keyleth is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it rolling at my feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run and jump for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. It's not your turn, it's the end of your turn. As it goes rolling, you run and dodge, go ahead and make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, all right. You jump out of the way, tumble, roll, and scoop up it in your arms once more, and you have it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a spell off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to get to your turn. Is that all you're going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was all of it? Can I run out of the room? If I can move. I'm going to run towards the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us now to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Relay race. Okay, then I take a step in front of her and pull out my daggers and stand in front of my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck is happening? Seeing all of this happen, I cast Hold Person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop trying to protect the skull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At 4th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To? Against?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Against Percy, Grog--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm out of the room, you can't see me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away are they? Can I turn around and see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say she just got out of the room, you would have visual on her as she's leaving the room, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Vax is standing in front of her, you have visual on both, technically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is so metal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex. Vex. Sorry, Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need a wisdom saving throw from all three of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, me too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just me. Yeah, you fucks are still mobile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boom, Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, that's a failure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Percy, your muscles tense up, and as you're holding your poker, you find yourself unable to move. Grog, you feel and look over and see Keyleth as she looks towards you with intensity, and you feel a similar tremor across your head, but you shrug it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These fucking sensations today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's weird. Vex, you as well, you glance over your shoulder as you hear Keyleth muttering under her breath, and you can feel that familiar sensation of the magical attempt to grasp your mind. Your half-elven self makes it even easier to shrug off, and you continue darting forth the direction you are with your brother behind you. So you're protecting her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yes, I'm barring the way

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're right up the hallway from our prison cell, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. I haven't got to your turn yet, though. So, does that end your turn? Do you want to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I say something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, yeah

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone, stop, why are we fighting? We just watched our city burn to the ground. What are we fighting over?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not fighting, they're trying to protect the skull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does this look like? What does this look like to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A statue garden?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone, get in Percy's workshop and we're going to talk this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, you don't know what's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look what happened because you assholes aren't communicating.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (muffled mumbling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up, Percy! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, did you just say you want to protect the skull?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I want to break the skull. I want to get rid of the dragons

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, what were you trying to do when you brought Percy and Vex up here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It needed someone with a dark touch. But now it's--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To do what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To get the wish, but now it's touching everyone, they're trying to protect the skull, and we don't want that. We want it broken, I think.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But you want the wish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we want the wish, we can do whatever we want to with the wish and not take it, but yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There has to be some type of payment, if we take a wish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it didn't say anything about a payment. There are four dragons killing everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, as you guys are having this conversation, and you guys are darting out, Vex, you stop, as coming down the stairs from the main floor is Erwen. Frazzled, but still put together as well as he can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tuck it behind my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, Lady Vex'ahlia, it appears you have a few guests, suddenly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? What kind of guests?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's been here before. I don't recognize the other; in the dining area."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does she look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blonde hair."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dwarven individual."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's Allura and Kima.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a little like Clue: the Movie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It kind of is. Yes-- Erwen. Bring them down here. It's an emergency

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, I'll--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As quickly as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes." And he turns around and hustles up the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we all please go back in Percy's workshop?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet, darling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, let's just wait until Allura gets here. I feel like she might have a calming effect on this situation, an outside eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are standing in the damn hall, all I am asking is that we move into a quiet room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point now, at the top of the stairway, two individuals come walking down. First and foremost, you see a dwarven male with short black hair and a beard, trimmed fairly fine, red leathers, carrying some sort of crooked wand on the side. Behind him you see, hair tossed back as she rushes down after him, Arcanist Allura Vysoren.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sheath my daggers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She looks about curiously and the dwarf goes, "Okay, what have we stepped into here?" And Allura puts her hand on his shoulder and goes, "Don't worry. I apologize for my "intrusion. I had a-- is everything all right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could use your help at this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't mind him accompanying us as well?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, he's one of the finest."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A good person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've put my life in his hands a number of times, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Things are a lot more complicated than you can even imagine. Please come in, we need you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes." And as you guys are having this standoff, you watch as this black-haired, red-leathered dwarf walks in, looking around and inspecting intently. You don't recognize him, you've never seen him before

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's he wielding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No weapons on him. You see him clutching this gnarled, curved wand that almost spirals, like a piece of well-treated but messed up wood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A stick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe. And Allura rushes in, muttering under her breath, "I was just in Whitestone and I had a "terrible feeling come over me and all my teleportation sigils within the city were suddenly "severed. Both my tower and the Lyceum. I had to manually teleport us here as it was the only place "I really had enough familiarity with far enough away from the city in case something bad had "happened, I hope you don't mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not at all. We're grateful for your help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you do us a favor? We had a small accident with Percival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet, not yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does she know about the-- D--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. So... Emon is in ruins. It's been destroyed by dragons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four. Ancient. Dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They call themselves the Chroma Conclave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And your tower is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucked!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go ahead and drop the Hold Person on Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And her face goes white, the blood runs from her entire complexion, and you can see the dwarf that initially was huffed up and intense in his energy, while not fully understanding what's going on, looks over to Allura and softens and walks up and puts his hand on her shoulder. "You okay, lass?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, my lady. Did you know that Uriel planned to step down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He threatened it--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- for weeks-- what?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He did it, and moments later four old dragons descended upon the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Cloudtop District has been demolished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This cannot be."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can only expect the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This cannot be."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unfortunately, Allura, all of that is the reason for our current impasse. We seem to have discovered something that could potentially reverse the situation. But there's a great price to pay. It could be a small price to pay, we don't know. If you wouldn't mind taking a look at this relic that we discovered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see, she is still lost in thought and there's something in her mind that's distracting her immensely, but she eventually clarifies and her eyes focus on you once more and she goes, "Of course, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't give it to her, but I pull the tapestry off of the skull and show it to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're rowdy, evil, pirating, marauding "individuals, and that's one sense. The gem within that skull appears to be a soul gem and contains "the soul of, from what I can gather, a Githyanki individual. Very old. I can say at least from my "knowledge and learned opinion that no good can come from such an artifact."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. He can grant a wish, he says? Lying, truth? What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to say. It would take a very powerful individual to do so, however, I would say "that wishes granted by entities that do not correspond with your moral outlook for the most "part rarely end up in your favor, even when carefully worded."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. No, but I remember this, we dealt with this with the demon that killed Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, but we used our wish to wish ourselves out of that contract.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it had to be so carefully worded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can destroy more, if we're not careful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There have been powerful individuals, who upon obtaining the ability to make such a wish, "even as careful as they were, they reached beyond the means of its magic, and doing so, undid "themselves. It's a very, very powerful, very dangerous magic, and if this entity is indeed "even capable of doing so, who's to say the chances that it wouldn't wreak more havoc than you "intended?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in a precarious position. The city is in ruins, already, in a matter of hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And at this point, she looks around for a chair. You can see her hands are shaking, and she goes and grabs a chair and pulls it up and sits down for a second, puts her hands on her knees, and quietly, "Describe to me these dragons."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was one of each color.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A green, a black, a white.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a big red piece of shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All colors except for blue of the chromatic spectrum. I got a few of their names.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go through each color, she nods, but when you say the big red, her body freezes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this sound familiar to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The names, you said?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a white dragon that called himself Vorugal. A green dragon, Raishan. Black dragon, Umbrasyl, and the red dragon, we haven't heard his name yet. He seems to be the leader.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point she nods and goes, "I know not the middle two, but Vorugal has been known to "wander the wastes north in Othanzia. Some of the offspring have wandered further, in fact I believe "the Skysunder that you destroyed naught but two years ago that was sealed in the Frostweald was one "of its brethren. Its children. But Vorugal has not been seen wandering this far out. Chromatics do "not work together, they are selfish and greedy and territorial."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're definitely working together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This red you say is the leader?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, most definitely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He had a message that he belted over the entire city. He said that we who live, he's showing mercy and that we can either fight or flee, and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said if we fight or flee, we'll be denied the mercy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, something along those lines. And then he said that it was the guardians of this city that brought this upon Emon, and that he has control. He called it like a new order.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said our new purpose is to serve him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now for the first time, you have known Allura for quite some time, she's been a very stoic, strong, confident, and powerful person. At this moment, she has withered. She looks genuinely like she's hit a level of fear you have never seen in an individual like this, and it shakes you to see this upon her face, and she puts her hand up and says, "This is not your fault. This burden is mine." And looks over to the dwarf and says, "It is ours." And the dwarf, you can now see, he's nodding in understanding. "This dragon... it's been called many names, but the one that it's "taken is Thordak, The Cinder King."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the sacrifice of many, including our "companions Sirus, Dohla, Ghenn, we succeeded." And as the tears begin to roll down her face, she looks around. "For naught now, it seems, and somehow he has broken our invocation. We bound his "essence to the fountains of creation and thought he would stay there forever." And she goes quiet and looks around for a second. "I'm sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This couldn't be because of our journey to the elemental plane, could it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We saw him there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did, but it sounds like he has been....

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't set him free, you don't think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it was Keyleth's Ashari thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My people-- Our job is to guard these realms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any way of contacting the Fire Ashari?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, oh god. Oh god, what if they're-- what if they're dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To bind him, we created an artifact called a soul anchor. It was crafted from the salvaged "heart crystal of a primordial fire titan. The anchor could not be removed from the plane, and "the Cinder King could not leave without it. I don't know how he's managed to escaped the binding "of this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, this is all my fault.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. No. This was a land mine waiting to be stepped on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But wait. We fought-- We fought my elders, we fought the Headmaster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It couldn't have been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would have no bearing on this. The heart crystal is immense. 15, 20 feet in diameter, "it's a gem of pure crystallized ruby and elemental power and energy. Lest you managed to find this "and destroy it, which, I mean no offence, is far beyond your capability."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My people, would they be okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The timing is rather conspicuous, seeing as how "Winter's Crest recently passed, in which time the planes are the thinnest barricades."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever it is, I fear that our ruse will not work twice, especially if Thordak has had all "this time to obsess over his failure. I do not know our next course of action."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you know of General Krieg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's been gone for some time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were on the council with him, do you know anything further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think it was discussed that he had been killed during the demonic intrusion in the city, "or deserted."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would a dragon seek vengeance against one of their brethren killed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Chromatics are selfish beings, they do not care for each other, and the power of one is "enough, but a conclave of dragons is both extraordinary and horrifying, but there is no-- "There is no sense of vengeance for their kin unless it is against the greater plan. Now, if "what you say is true and these other dragons are bound together in the service of Thordak, I "imagine they would be the ones who had the power and the resources to find some way to bring him through."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the dwarf steps up and still has his hand rubbing Allura's shoulder and says, "We knew not what we were doing, other than trying to save it, don't blame yourself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you consider us guardians of this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One of many. I believe the guardians--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this because of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura looks at you dead-on and says, "The only guardians that Thordak would know of would be "the ones that sent him away to that plane 15 years ago. This is my fault."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not true. If we are to solve this situation we cannot hide the truth. I killed Krieg. We killed Krieg. I finished Krieg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Krieg was a dragon, Allura.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A blue dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We stumbled upon his lair, reached through his home in Emon, through magical means. We found his lair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He attacked us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we-- I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach out and I grab Vax's hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We survived.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When it happened, he had four stones, four orbs in his lair. They saw us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They spoke out to us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They threatened us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When was this? Was this--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Many years ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe two years ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not all that long ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was right after we got to Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been over a year at least. Well, if it's taken them that long at least to free Thordak, it "means that this was probably in the works for quite some time. If we do share this responsibility, I "assure you it weighs heavier on me than it does you. But right now we need all the allies we can "gather. Now, you say Thordak is where right now?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sitting on Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Within the city?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, you would know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can sense them. Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's for a six-mile radius, was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the edge of your senses, you close your eyes and focus and extend your ability to feel the landscape around you. Indeed, The Cinder King still sits in the center of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What of the others?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I sense any others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're gone for the time being.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's weird, they do what he says.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Barely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And on top of all that, we have this fucking skull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to check in with my people. I need to check in with the Air Ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's the rest? Where's the council? Who do we know survived?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know anything. Everyone was dying around us, we made it to the keep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It happened very quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know what happened to Uriel, we didn't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We need to take stock of who we can consider friends that are still around. We need "all allies right now. That should be our first order of business, if anything." And her face drops again. "I just lost my connection with Westruun."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck. The whole world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this is an annihilation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This isn't an annihilation, if this was an extermination there wouldn't be any survivors, you "wouldn't be here. The fact that they've only taken what they can of the city-- what use is a city "to a dragon if it doesn't have worshippers? They're vain beings."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think, Allura, what do all these cities have in common? And what would be the benefits of taking over these cities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Resources, their gold, their people."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think they just want domination over people? Over us? They called us ants!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They want to be gods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What good is a creature that sees itself as superior if there aren't those around it to tell "them as such and confirm the belief, and if anyone refuses to bend to their will through fear and "power. That is the nature of the chromatic dragons."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There has to be something more that they want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps, but for now, the fact that he's even shouted mercy at this time as opposed to "completely destroying everything in his wake, means that vanity can be used to our advantage. I "don't know how soon, but that's something. Now--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Allies. Vasselheim has warriors, armories.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can bring them here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to reach out to the Ashari and see if they're-- I leave, I want to go-- Well, actually; Allura, will you help me in a scrying spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes, the best I can, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to scry and first check in on the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, at this point she pulls out her crystal ball from a little tiny satchel, which is in itself a smaller Bag of Holding. Pulls out a small mirror, takes some water and pours it on the mirror, places the sphere above it, and it floats for a second. And there's a makeshift scrying ritual site here before you. You guys take about ten minutes to concentrate, and if you guys want to do anything in that ten-minute period, you're welcome to, or if you just want to watch and wait, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just sit, it's been a long, long day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The spell completes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I roll hit dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys can begin to take a short rest, if you want to heal up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go over to my sister in that time. I want-- I want to kill that dragon. Or I want to die trying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Cerkonos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself swooping across the shores of Othanzia, over the forests, eventually coming upon the blackened clouds that perpetually hang above the charred mountain range that contains the home of the Fire Ashari and the entrance to the elemental plane of fire. Your vision crests the mountain and steps into the valley of broken, blackened shale to the ever-burning forest. As you come upon it, you recall where the Fire Ashari village was and where you were greeted before and given your trials. Where there is now nothing but sundered, broken wood, tents, destroyed bodies burned and charred and curled up in horrible ever-gasping pain. The forest itself is flattened from the inside out, like a blast from the center of it just exploded outward, the trees all bent and snapped at the base, and in the center, where there once was that small pool of molten lava that you created the portal through and stepped into the elemental plane, there is a large, ominous, flickering gash between the planes that is roughly 30 to 40 feet in width and height that is pulsing as fire and magma pours out of it. You can see wandering imps and elementals and various entities slowly peeking out and escaping and wandering throughout the mountain tops. From what you can see, there are no signs of any survivors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It destroyed everything. They killed everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura at this point, who pulls out of the ritual, reaches out and grabs you by the shoulders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We failed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she looks you in the eyes, and for a moment you feel like her normally warm and embracing face has gone cold and intense and her voice seems to echo with an undercurrent of arcane focus and volume. She goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My people failed, we failed our cause.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is their making, this is not yours. These "creatures are evil incarnate, and it is our job, our true calling to end what they have done. Do "not let this crush you, you are stronger than that. Pull yourself together. Your people, those "that remain, they stand behind you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not as strong as you, Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you can be and you will be. Do you trust me? Do you trust me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good." Her grasp releases.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What say you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are to stand now or we might as well be dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're definitely not going to wish on this skull then, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would recommend against it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, let us prepare for the fall of the Chroma Conclave. Together." And that's where we'll end our session for tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking A!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey guys, D&D's fun! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: D&D will never be fun again; everything's ruined.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, we're all cows! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back when things were so much simpler.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be sure to buy a t-shirt over on geekandsundry.com.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In Sam's honor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What in the hell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah yes, thank you. It's so porous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we play longer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we play longer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it? It's ten o'clock, and we ended on time and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the first time we've ever ended on time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow, that game felt like 20 hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Originally this was supposed to be a three-hour show, but it never quite made it that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know we tried, we try and mostly fail, but occasionally we get it right. So, I mean, I'd say I'm sorry for the emotional rollercoaster, but no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The was fucking awesome.That was awesome, aside from the death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Throwing that out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My plan was to take that skull and run like a fucking football player and fucking go for the goal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Flash Gordon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I would have been in the heart of Emon. Shoving it up the red dragon's nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well. Welcome to the new story arc.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything changed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Oh man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When do I level up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to find a corner to rock back and forth in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would have been working in a lich's sugar mine if you'd done that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, we all would have been kings and queens, we would be drinking iced mochas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was more afraid of us wishing ourselves out of existence. I wish there were no more dragons... and no more people and no more--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like, can you imagine how bad of a deal that must have been?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was really looking for a reason to say yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it turns out that it was just a fucking lame-ass pirate. Fuck that, we don't want to be indebted to some shithead pirate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing good happens when you let Mxyzptlk out of the goddamn skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was fun. I set a time for myself when she's gonna arrive, and I was like, "Oh man, "what's going to happen before she gets there?" I was like, as you guys kept delaying it, they might actually-- she might actually catch them in time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She would have walked in and we're beating the shit out of each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It all would have gone to hell if--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know what would happen. You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would have saved the world, that's what would have happened. Fucking one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of you have heard of a githyanki in your travels.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would have been King Grog, I would have gotten a cave, I would had a bunch of harem people taking care of me, giving me sponge baths with their tongues.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to carve my name in your nuts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would object to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We still have the dragon problem, but now have the dragon and a pirate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should make it every week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this mean I'm the last druid to make the Aramente?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There might have been one after you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's got to be other ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you saw, the Fire Ashari were decimated, you saw a number of bodies, you don't know if any escaped, you don't if any were hidden, you don't know what happened. At that location, it is desolation, and you get the sense from that, that is precisely the place where Thordak came through the plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm wondering about the other locations, though, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to know about Whitestone. We have a lot a phone calls to make.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a lot of phone calls. Like I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're all dead, everybody's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Theoretically wiped my people off the face of the planet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Such an optimist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they all busted through--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does decimate mean that 1/10 survived? Or that only 10% died? I can never remember which one decimated is. I know it's one of the two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that term has been largely misused in the current-day vernacular.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 10% died, that's what it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love misusing vernacular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun. You guys--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great fucking story Matt, holy shit. Holy shit, you had trees and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do you got to be a dick, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As we're discovering the white battlemats don't pick up as well on the camera as the colors, I'm trying to use other options whenever possible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It works. The green was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was really cool with green.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm going to try and push more on that. A little more work on my end, but it'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me more, sadist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks for joining us, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, thank you for watching, and hope you have a wonderful night, and we'll see you guys next Thursday. Good night!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a cigarette, and I don't smoke.
